required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Post-prandial Glucose in Healthy Indian Subjects
clinical_study.official_title: Effect of Plant-based Ingredient in Different Food Formats on Post-prandial Glucose in Healthy Indian Subjects

brief_summary.textblock: The study is designed to determine the extent to which a plant-based ingredient on different food formats affect blood glucose responses in healthy subjects

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.measure: Positive incremental post-prandial blood glucose area under the curve

secondary_outcome.measure: Post-prandial insulin area under the curve

arm_group.description: reference food format with and without plant-based ingredient added
Food format one with and without plant-based ingredient added
Food format two with and without plant-based ingredient added
Food format three with and without plant-based ingredient added
